ArgumentError.string: The argument must be a string.
ArgumentError.optString: The argument must be a string or null.
ArgumentError.manString: The argument must be a non-empty string.
ArgumentError.optNumber: The argument must be a number value or null.
ArgumentError.manNumber: The argument must be a number value.
ArgumentError.optInteger: The argument must be an integer value or null.
ArgumentError.manInteger: The argument must be an integer value.
ArgumentError.optBoolean: The argument must be a Boolean value or null.
ArgumentError.manBoolean: The argument must be a Boolean value.
ArgumentError.optObject: The argument must be an object or null.
ArgumentError.manObject: The argument must be an object.
ArgumentError.optFunction: The argument must be a function or null.
ArgumentError.manFunction: The argument must be a function.
ArgumentError.optType: The argument must be a {0} object or null.
ArgumentError.manType: The argument must be a {0} object.
ArgumentError.enumType: The {0} is not an enumeration type.

DataTypeError.default: The data type of the passed value is invalid.
DataTypeError.boolean: The passed value is not Boolean.
DataTypeError.date: The passed value is not DateTime.
DataTypeError.decimal: The passed value is not Decimal.
DataTypeError.integer: The passed value is not Integer.
DataTypeError.text: The passed value is not Text.

EnumerationError.enumValue: The passed value ({1}) is not a {0} item.
EnumerationError.enumName: The passed name ({1}) is not a {0} item.

AuthorizationError.default: The user has no permission to execute the action.

ModelError.default: An error occurred in the model.
